articles.title: Netherlands edge out Ukraine in five-goal thriller - SuperSport
articles.description: Flying full back Denzel Dumfries scored a late winner to earn the Netherlands a 3-2 victory over Ukraine in a thrilling Group C opener at the European Championship on Sunday.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Soccer-Late Dumfries header secures Dutch win after Ukraine fightback - The Star Online
articles.description: AMSTERDAM (Reuters) -Flying full back Denzel Dumfries scored a late winner to earn the Netherlands a 3-2 victory over Ukraine in a thrilling Group C opener at the European Championship on Sunday after the Dutch had thrown away a two-goal lead.

articles.title: Biden lands in Brussels to reaffirm NATO ties frayed under Trump - Daily Mail
articles.description: Joe Biden touched down in Brussels on Sunday evening as he continues his first foreign trip as president and keeps his focus on rebuilding ties with European allies.
articles.content:

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Football: Sterling gives England opening Euro 2020 win over Croatia - CNA
articles.description: LONDON: Raheem Sterling finally found his tournament touch when his 61st-minute goal gave England a deserved 1-0 win over Croatia at Wembley on Sunday (Jun 13) as they began a European Championship with a victory for the first time in nine attempts.

articles.title: Pope mourns migrant dead in Med, 'Europe's biggest cemetery' - Manila Bulletin
articles.description:
Pope Francis on Sunday warned the Mediterranean had become the "biggest cemetery in Europe", as he remembered the migrants who died trying to reach the continent.
